resources.string: An attentive panda sitting on a bamboo bench in the forest.
Enter desired lesson number and click on panda.
resources.array:
好。Hǎo. Good, okay.
不好。Bù hǎo. Not good, not okay.
好不好？Hǎo bù hǎo? Okay?
很好。Hěn hǎo. Very good.
你好。Nǐ hǎo. Hello.
你好吗？Nǐ hǎo ma? Are you well?
你们好。Nǐ men hao. Hi, guys.
你们好吗？Nǐ men hǎo ma? Are you guys well?
我很好。Wǒ hěn hǎo. I am very good.
我们很好，谢谢。Wǒ men hěn hǎo, xiè xie. We are very good, thanks.
我们在哪儿？Wǒ men zài nǎ’er? Where are we?
我们在饭店。Wǒ men zài fàn diàn. We are at a restaurant.
你吃什么？Nǐ chī shén me? What are you eating?
我吃米饭，你呢？Wǒ chī mǐ fàn, nǐ ne? I am eating rice, what about you?
我不想吃。Wǒ bù xiǎng chī. I do not want to eat.
你喝水吗？Nǐ hē shuǐ ma? Are you drinking water?
我不喜欢水。Wǒ bù xǐ huan shuǐ. I do not like water.
我喝茶。Wǒ hē chá. I am drinking tea.
这是什么菜？Zhè shì shén me cài? What dish is this?
这是水果，它很好吃！Zhè shì shuǐ guǒ, tā hěn hǎo chī! This is fruit, it is very delicious!
我叫鲁迅。Wǒ jiào Lǔ Xùn. My name is Lu Xun.
你叫什么名字？Nǐ jiào shén me míng zì？ What is your name?
我喜欢你的名字。Wǒ xǐ huān nǐ dí míng zì. I like your name.
你住在哪儿？Nǐ zhù zài nǎ ér？Where do you live?
我住在中国。Wǒ zhù zài Zhōng Guó. I live in China.
我爱中国。Wǒ ài Zhōng Guó. I love China.
我爸爸是中国人。Wǒ bà bà shì Zhōng Guó rén. My father is Chinese.
他妈妈是老师。Tā mā mā shì lǎo shī. His mother is a teacher.
她会说汉语。Tā huì shuō hàn yǔ. She can speak Chinese.
中国人都会说汉语。Zhōng Guó rén duō huì shuō hàn yǔ. Chinese people can all speak Chinese.
你有几个苹果？Nǐ yǒu jǐ gè píng guǒ? How many apples do you have?
我有一个苹果。Wǒ yǒu yī gè píng guǒ. I have one apple.
他有三个儿子。他们很小。Tā yǒu sān gè ér zi. Tā men hěn xiǎo. He has three sons. They are very little.
她有五个女儿。她们很大。Tā yǒu wǔ gè nǚ ér. Tā men hěn dà. She has five daughters. They are very big.
他们有四个儿子和六个女儿。Tā men yǒu sì gè ér zi hé liù gè nǚ ér. They have four sons and six daughters.
你的电话是多少？Nǐ de diàn huà shì duō shǎo? What is your phone number?
我的电话是一二三四五六七八九零。Wǒ de diàn huà shì yī èr sān sì wǔ liù qī bā jiǔ líng. My phone number is 1234567890.
我能打电话吗？Wǒ néng dǎ diànhuà ma? May I make a phone call?
没关系。Méi guān xì. That is all right.-->
再见。Zài jiàn. Goodbye.-->
先生，你好吗？Xiān shēng, nǐ hǎo ma? Sir, are you well?
李先生没有电脑。Lǐ xiān shēng méi yǒu diàn nǎo. Mr. Li does not have a computer.
王小姐没有电视。Wáng xiǎo jiě méi yǒu diàn shì. Miss Wang does not have a television.
你想不想看电影？Nǐ xiǎng bù xiǎng kàn diàn yǐng? Do you want to see a movie?
对不起，我没有钱。Duì bù qǐ, wǒ méi yǒu qián. Sorry, I have no money.
没关系，我有很多钱。Méi guān xì, wǒ yǒu hěn duō qián. That is alright, I have a lot of money.
谢谢你！Xiè xiè nǐ! Thank you!
不客气。Bù kè qì. You are welcome.
我们去看电影。Wǒ men qù kàn diàn yǐng. We are going to see a movie.
明天见。Míngtiān jiàn. See you tomorrow.-->
今天我们去北京。Jīn tiān wǒ men qù Běi Jīng. Today we are going to Beijing.
北京在哪儿？Běi Jīng zài nǎ er? Where is Beijing?
北京在中国。Běi Jīng zài Zhōng Guó.
我们怎么去北京？Wǒ men zěn me qù Běi Jīng? How are we going to Beijing?
我们坐火车去。Wǒ men zuò huǒ chē qù. We are going by train.
我们不坐飞机。Wǒ men bù zuò fēi jī. We are not taking a plane.
现在我们去火车站。Xiàn zài wǒ men qù huǒ chē zhàn. Now we are going to the train station.
我们坐出租车。Wǒ men zuò chū zū chē. We are taking a taxi.
北京的天气很好。Běi jīng de tiān qì hěn hǎo. Beijing\'s weather is very good.
我很高兴！Wǒ hěn gāo xìng! I am very happy!
你喜欢你的学校吗？Nǐ xǐ huān nǐ de xué xiào ma? Do you like your school?
喜欢！Xǐ huān! Yes, I like it!
老师都很好。Lǎo shī dōu hěn hǎo. The teachers are all very good.
我最喜欢我的中文老师。Wǒ zuì xǐ huān wǒ de zhōng wén lǎoshī. I most like my Chinese teacher.
你会写中文吗？Nǐ huì xiě zhōng wén ma? Can you write Chinese?
我会写十个字。Wǒ huì xiě shí gè zì. I can write ten characters.
我有一本书。Wǒ yǒu yī běn shū. I have one book.
它在桌子上。Tā zài zhuō zi shàng. It is on the table.
你的汉语很好！Nǐ de hàn yǔ hěn hǎo! Your (spoken) Chinese is very good!
对不起。我听不懂。Duì bù qǐ. Wǒ tīng bù dǒng. I\'m sorry. I don\'t understand.
你的中文老师是谁？Nǐ de zhōng wén lǎo shī shì shéi? Who is your Chinese teacher?
他是陈老师。Tā shì Chén lǎoshī. He is Teacher Chen.
我认识他。Wǒ rèn shí tā. I know him.
他是我的朋友。Tā shì wǒ de péng yǒu. He is my friend.
你认识我的同学吗？Nǐ rèn shí wǒ de tóng xué ma? Do you know my classmate?
他叫什么名字？Tā jiào shén me míng zì. What is his name?
他叫小赵。Tā jiào Xiǎo Zhào. His name is Young Zhao.
不认识。Bù rèn shí. I don\'t know him.
学生做什么？Xué shēng zuò shén me? What do students do?
学生学习。Xué shēng xué xí. Students study.
